message:
I’ve fully implemented the `nsa` function in `NSA.py` to match the reference in `NSA_golden.py`, including gating, block selection, sliding window, and variable-length support. You can now run:

```
cd NSA
pip install torch einops
pytest tests/test_nsa.py tests/test_nsa_with_compression.py
```

to verify correctness. Let me know if any tests fail or if further tweaks are needed!
